page.title: 17CHELMSFORD GOLF COURSE
page.content:
Chelmsford Golf Course occupies an an area of some 127 acres and is just to the south of{St.John's Hospital}and to the east of the the main railway line and the present A12 trunk road.The course is not easily seen by the passer-by as it is bounded by the railway,housing and farmland.
The course has been open on this site since 1922. Before that the land was used partly as farmland and partly as a{brick works.}
The course is not open to the general public as it is a private club;there are approximately 650 members.
The piece of woodland called { {Thriftwood,}which is surrounded by the golf course, also belongs to the club.
